actions.comment: when a player leaves, destroy all units owned by that player

fighter.shader: uniform sampler2D uSampler; varying vec2 vTextureCoord; uniform float uTime; vec3 hsv2rgb(vec3 c) { vec4 K = vec4(1.0, 2.0 / 3.0, 1.0 / 3.0, 3.0); vec3 p = abs(fract(c.xxx + K.xyz) * 6.0 - K.www); return c.z * mix(K.xxx, clamp(p - K.xxx, 0.0, 1.0), c.y); } void main() {float sinTime = clamp((sin(uTime) + 1.0) / 2.0, 0.0, 1.0);vec3 col = hsv2rgb(vec3(sinTime, 1.0, 0.8)); gl_FragColor = vec4(col.x, col.y, col.z, 1.0) * texture2D(uSampler, vTextureCoord);}
fighter.name: Unit

settings.menudiv: Simple game with no rules. Players can move using WASD or Arrow keys.
